import React,{ Component} from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; class CurrentlyReading extends React.Component{ static propTypes = { getCRBooks: PropTypes.func.isRequired } render(){ const {getCRBooks} = this.props return(

Currently Reading

    {getCRBooks.map((book) => (
  1. To Kill a Mockingbird
    Harper Lee
    2. ))}
  2. Ender's Game
    Orson Scott Card
); } } export default CurrentlyReading;
